simlib.geometry.polar_to_cartesian¶

simlib.geometry.polar_to_cartesian(a)[source]¶

Convert polar to Cartesian coordinates.

Parameters

a (ArrayLike) – Polar coordinates

Returns

Cartesian coordinates, same shape as a

Return type

float or numpy.ndarray

Next topic
